Root Cause: Missing or incorrect path aliases in vite.config.js
Fix 1: Add alias in resolve.alias config
Fix 3: Update import path to use correct case sensitivity
Validation Step: Check if file exists and import resolves

Symptom/Error: Plugin is not running in development
Root Cause: Plugin apply condition excludes development mode
Fix 1: Set plugin apply to 'serve' or remove apply
Fix 2: Add conditional logic in plugin function
Fix 3: Check plugin order in plugins array
Validation Step: Verify plugin logs appear in console

Symptom/Error: TypeError: Cannot read property of undefined in plugin
Root Cause: Plugin receiving undefined config or context
Fix 1: Add null checks in plugin hooks
Fix 3: Check plugin compatibility with Vite version

Symptom/Error: HMR not working for specific file type
Root Cause: File extension not recognized by HMR system
Fix 1: Add file extension to server.watch config
Fix 2: Install appropriate plugin for file type
Fix 3: Configure custom HMR handling in code
Diagnostic Command: Check network tab for HMR requests

Symptom/Error: Full page reload instead of HMR
Root Cause: Module has side effects or circular dependencies
Fix 1: Use import.meta.hot.accept() correctly
Fix 3: Refactor to avoid circular imports

Root Cause: Large number of dependencies or inefficient scanning
Fix 1: Add frequently used deps to optimizeDeps.include
Fix 3: Enable server.warmup for critical files

Root Cause: No code splitting or manual chunking configured
Fix 1: Configure manual chunks in rollupOptions
Fix 2: Use dynamic imports for code splitting
Fix 3: Enable tree shaking with proper sideEffects config
Validation Step: Bundle size reduced by expected amount

Symptom/Error: Build fails with 'out of memory' error
Root Cause: Large codebase exceeding Node.js memory limit
Fix 1: Increase Node.js memory limit with --max-old-space-size
Fix 3: Use build.chunkSizeWarningLimit to identify large chunks

Root Cause: sourcemap option not enabled in build config
Fix 1: Set build.sourcemap to true
Fix 3: Configure terserOptions to preserve source maps
Validation Step: Source maps available in browser devtools

Symptom/Error: TypeScript errors not showing in dev
Root Cause: TypeScript checking disabled or misconfigured
Fix 1: Install @vitejs/plugin-react-swc with TypeScript support
Fix 2: Add typescript plugin to vite config
Fix 3: Configure build.rollupOptions to use tsc

Root Cause: React plugin not configured or outdated version
Fix 1: Update @vitejs/plugin-react to latest version
Fix 3: Add react runtime to optimizeDeps.include
Diagnostic Command: Check React DevTools for refresh status
Validation Step: Component state preserved on file changes

Root Cause: Vue plugin missing or misconfigured
Fix 1: Install and configure @vitejs/plugin-vue
Fix 3: Add vue to optimizeDeps.include
Diagnostic Command: Check console for Vue compilation errors

Root Cause: CSS import path incorrect or processing error
Fix 1: Check CSS import syntax and file path
Fix 2: Configure CSS preprocessor plugin if needed
Fix 3: Add CSS file extension to resolve.extensions
Diagnostic Command: Check network tab for CSS request status

Root Cause: Assets not in public folder or incorrect import method
Fix 1: Move assets to public/ folder for static serving
Fix 2: Use import syntax for processed assets
Fix 3: Check base path configuration for asset URLs
Diagnostic Command: Check network tab for asset request URLs
Validation Step: Assets load with correct MIME types

Root Cause: PostCSS config missing or plugin not installed
Fix 1: Create postcss.config.js with required plugins
Fix 3: Check plugin order in PostCSS config
Diagnostic Command: Check if CSS contains expected transformations

Root Cause: Different module resolution between CRA and Vite
Fix 1: Update imports to use explicit file extensions
Fix 3: Update tsconfig.json paths configuration
Diagnostic Command: Check if imports resolve without errors
Validation Step: All imports work in both dev and build

Root Cause: Different env var prefix (REACT_APP vs VITE)
Fix 1: Rename environment variables to VITE_ prefix
Fix 2: Update import.meta.env usage instead of process.env
Fix 3: Add variables to define config for build-time replacement

Root Cause: Server-side rendering configuration issues
Fix 1: Configure separate client and server builds
Fix 2: Set build.ssr option for server entry
Fix 3: Add conditional logic for server vs client code

Root Cause: Large number of dependencies or scanning issues
Fix 1: Add commonly used deps to optimizeDeps.include
Fix 3: Use optimizeDeps.exclude for problematic packages

Root Cause: ESM/CJS compatibility issues with dependencies
Fix 1: Add dependency to optimizeDeps.include
Fix 3: Use dynamic import for problematic modules
Diagnostic Command: Check browser console for module errors

Root Cause: Multiple versions or conflicting optimization settings
Fix 1: Clear node_modules/.vite cache
Fix 2: Check for duplicate dependencies in package-lock.json
Fix 3: Use resolutions field to force single version
Validation Step: Single version of dependencies in use

Root Cause: Plugin not properly registered or hooks misconfigured
Fix 1: Check plugin is in plugins array in config
Fix 2: Verify hook names match Vite/Rollup API
Fix 3: Add logging to plugin hooks for debugging
Diagnostic Command: Check plugin execution order in debug output
Validation Step: Plugin hooks execute at expected times

Root Cause: Plugin incompatible with Vite version or other plugins
Fix 1: Update plugin to compatible version
Fix 3: Test with minimal plugin configuration
Diagnostic Command: Build without plugin to isolate issue

Symptom/Error: Plugin state not persisting between hooks
Root Cause: Plugin not handling state management correctly
Fix 1: Use plugin closure to maintain state
Fix 2: Implement shared state between hook calls
Fix 3: Use external state management if needed
Diagnostic Command: Add logging to verify state persistence

Root Cause: Development server not configured for cross-origin requests
Fix 1: Configure server.cors in vite config
Fix 2: Set up proxy rules for API endpoints
Fix 3: Add CORS headers to API server
Diagnostic Command: Check network tab for CORS errors
Validation Step: API requests succeed without CORS errors

Root Cause: Proxy configuration incorrect or conflicting rules
Fix 1: Check proxy path matching and target URL
Fix 2: Verify changeOrigin setting for different hosts
Fix 3: Test proxy rules with curl or Postman
Diagnostic Command: curl through Vite dev server proxy

Root Cause: Proxy not configured for WebSocket upgrade
Fix 1: Set ws: true in proxy configuration
Fix 3: Check WebSocket URL matches proxy pattern

Root Cause: Inefficient build configuration or large bundles
Fix 1: Enable parallel builds with multiple workers
Fix 3: Use build.minify: 'esbuild' for faster minification

Root Cause: Large bundle size or memory leak in plugins
Fix 1: Increase Node.js memory limit
Fix 3: Profile memory usage with --inspect flag

Root Cause: Code not being deduplicated properly
Fix 1: Configure rollupOptions.external for shared deps
Fix 2: Use manual chunking to group related modules
Fix 3: Enable tree shaking with proper package.json sideEffects
Diagnostic Command: Check bundle analyzer for duplicate modules
Validation Step: No duplicate modules in final bundle
